# BufferListFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool BufferListFunc(out IntPtr buffer, uint idx, IntPtr user_data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| buffer | Transfer ownership: full; Nullable: true |
| idx | Transfer ownership: none |
| user_data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
